text:
r. There is a lot that can be done through the courts for emergency monetary 
relief or maintenance, and this is all done through a protection order at a Magistrate’s Court. A woman can go 
straight to the clerk of the court for this, or an NGO’s can assist. 

NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA
